comments.body: Why did the height change by 4px?
Because before, the font size was large enough to be constrained by the fixed-height container, and now it is allowed to grow to it's proper size.  The overall widget is still the correct size.
Does the test also check the correct size?

Please insert a comment:
```dart
// Regression test for https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/40702.
```
